reviews.title: good shoes
reviews.name: Ripley
reviews.review: first of all, this is my second pair as i wear them until they deteriorate, which takes about 2 years. I do use them as my main sandals, they're not just a little joke going out thing, and the hold up very well. The little flippers on the insides fell off pretty quickly, but it doesn't ruin the look at all. they are hilarious, and i am constantly getting stopped by people in stores and just around town who think theyre awesome or want to take pictures of them. i call them my "fish flops" and theyre a huge hit.they're comfortable to wear, but they have two main issues: there is zero arch support, and the foam is really thin, so if you are walking across anything rocky/gravel, you can really feel it in your feet. another thing about them, which may be an issue for some, but wasn't really a big deal for me, is that the flipper part at the back sort of functions like a scoop, and if you walk through loose sand or water it gets a lot harder as the back will be flinging the ground right back at you. all in all, they're unique and funny, and hold up pretty well. I highly recommend them.

They look so funny, I can‚Äôt say he would wear them outside the house but thought they would be ideal for when he takes a ‚Äúciggy break‚Äù outside and for the summer evenings in the garden, I had to try them on myself when they arrived and I found them to be a lot more comfortable than I was expecting, they feel quite soft and spongy to walk in a bit like the old ‚Äújellies‚Äù I used to wear as a kid. I don‚Äôt think they will rub against the skin either they seem to be very ‚Äògiving‚Äô. Hopefully he will like them and the rest of us will have a laugh come Christmas Day.
